title: PULSEFIRE EZREAL - Didn't recieve icon! Waited almost a month already.
body: I recently got Pulsefire Ezreal from the mystery gift reward in the beginning of this year, but i didn't not receive the icon. Any thoughts?

replies.body: I'm sorry you haven't had a great experience in the past, but they're the ones who will be able to resolve this issue for you.

Hey there! 

For something like this, I'd suggest shooting a message over to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to take a look at your account, and resolve the issue. :]

They didn't resolve my issue about FPS drops. They said it was one of my processes, which upon removal didn't work. I put all that time into doing the steps and providing the information they wanted, and I get this in return? they also didn't give me a human response to my chat restriction query, and simply gave a blanket statement claiming they analysed my games, which they didn't because it took three hours for a reply, and I had loads more than three hours worth of game time. Not impressed with player support, and nobody will listen. Sorry.
